definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: The city's weather bureau gave air quality a rare hazardous ranking.
sentences.chinese: 城市氣象局給了今天的空氣質量一個罕見的危險排名。

sentences.english: Mr. Zheng Guoguang, Director of China Meteorological Administration, attended the meeting and delivered a special report.
sentences.chinese: 中國氣象局局長鄭國光到會作專題報告。

sentences.english: Meteorological Service of Canada issued the first winter blizzard warning.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大氣象局1日發佈了今冬第一個暴雪警報。

sentences.english: Introduce the designing idea and base frame of the forecasting platform for county-level meteorological bureau.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了縣級氣象局預報平臺的設計思路和基本框架。

sentences.english: National Weather Service Northwest River Forecast Center.
sentences.chinese: 國家氣象局西北河展望中心。

sentences.english: Tools performs the database meteo and components management.
sentences.chinese: 氣象局執行的工具和組件數據庫管理。

sentences.english: 1870- the US Weather Bureau was established.
The statistical data from weather bureau showed there was a storm soon.
sentences.chinese: 氣象局的統計資料表明很快就有一次風暴。

sentences.english: Positions at weather bureaux are the least popular.
sentences.chinese: 相對而言，氣象局的職位則沒有那麼受歡迎。

sentences.english: The National Weather Agency assigns names to her farts .
sentences.chinese: 你媽媽胖到連國家氣象局都要替她的屁命名。

sentences.english: The Meteorologic Bureau forecasts a eclipse will be seen this night.
sentences.chinese: 氣象局表明今天晚上將會出現日食。

sentences.english: China Meteorological Bureau has launched its emergency response mechanism for weather-related disasters.
sentences.chinese: 中國氣象局已啓用應急措施應對自然災害。

sentences.english: Staff at the meteorology office explained where the sand from.
sentences.chinese: 氣象局的工作人員解釋沙塵暴的來源。

sentences.english: How long it takes you to develop frostbite will depend on the conditions.
sentences.chinese: 據國家氣象局說，多長時間會生凍瘡要視環境而定。

sentences.english: And here is an extract of the report from the local Central Weather Bureau's website.
sentences.chinese: 而下面這張圖是摘自中央氣象局網站上的報告。

definition: environment protection office/PRC National bureau of environmental protection
day after day/for several days running
